author: ratz
title: size matters!
review:
i got 4 of these in a grocery store, only because i had a coupon. otherwise i would not have bought them - too few bricks for the money.
i think these small brick boxes are made for petrol stations or shops which normally don't sell toys. for the case you are visiting your nephew, and forgot a present, and your last stop is the petrol station, then this box can be your ultimate makeshift!

author: mrmitch
title: Came with #4103 for a total of 400 bricks
review: Color is the main reason to get this bulk box. It has green, grey, as well as the color you would expect in a bulk tub. Fits in well with my "free-style bricks", adds to flexability to my creative projects.
